headline: Josh Harris’s Firm Strikes Deal for Middleby Unit That Makes Viking Stoves
summary: 26North is set to own 51% of the kitchen-products division that houses a number of luxury cookware-equipment brands.

raw.headline: Josh Harris’s Firm Strikes Deal for Middleby Unit That Makes Viking Stoves
raw.summary: 26North is set to own 51% of the kitchen-products division that houses a number of luxury cookware-equipment brands.

headline: Investors are scrambling for portfolio alternatives. A CIO urges caution — especially with private credit
summary: Interest in private markets and other alternatives is growing as markets grow more concentrated. Mercer's Niall O'Sullivan said investors should be careful.

raw.headline: Investors are scrambling for portfolio alternatives. A CIO urges caution — especially with private credit

headline: Think You Can Hide From The AI Bubble? Think Twice
summary: Massive AI CapEx and passive investing flows are inflating not just tech stocks but also related (indirectly linked) assets. Discover the full analysis here.
